BENEFICIARIES.Definition: people or groups who benefit from something happening

CONTROVERSY.Definition: a large amount of disagreement about something

EXCEPTIONS.Definition: something that isn't included in a rule

FAST.Definition: a fast is a period where you do not eat

KEEN.Definition: very interested, wanting to do something a lot

LABELS.Definition: a word or phrase used to describe something

OFFSET.Definition: the difference from the main time zone

OUTBREAK.Definition: a time when something starts happening

OUTWEIGHED.Definition: to be more important (than something else)

PHENOMENON.Definition: something that exists can be felt, especially something that's unusual

PRODUCTIVITY.Definition: the rate at which workers produce goods

PROPONENTS.Definition: people who want to do something

RECREATIONAL.Definition: related to recreation, an activity done for pleasure

TIMEKEEPING.Definition: the system of keeping the time

TO MAKE THE MOST.Definition: to get the greatest advantage from something
